title: Trump's Game 5 plan: Leave early
text:
President Trump plans to arrive at Game 5 of the World Series after the first pitch and leave before the final out.

Major League Baseball Commissioner Rob Manfred said he spoke with Mr. Trump, and the president decided it would be least disruptive to fans to do it that way.

Mr. Trump intends to come to Nationals Park on Sunday night if the Series is still going by then. The Nationals lead Houston 2-0.
